title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
The response can earn up to 2 points:

1 point: For f′(1)

f(1)= e 2 f ′ (x)=2 e 2x ⇒ f ′ (1)=2 e 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4CE3@

1 point: For the correct answer

An equation for the tangent line is y= e 2 +2 e 2 (x−1) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@416E@ .

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
